unemploymentContributionIndicator.description: Indicator to define whether or not a premium is paid for the unemployment law. Necessary to calculate the social insurance premium.

disabilityInsuranceContributionIndicator.description: Code to determine how the social insurance premium is calculated.

payrollTaxAndSocialSecurityPremiumsIndic.description: Defines whether certain tax deductions need to be applied when calculating the tax to be paid.

thirtyPercentRuleIndicator.description: Determine whether the 30%-rule (for Dutch employees that work in a foreign country or for foreign employees that work in the Netherlands) is applicable.

handicappedDiscountIndicator.description: Indicator to define wether or not the contribution discount for handicapped persons is applicable.

elderEmployeesDiscountIndicator.description: Indicator to define wether or not the contribution discount for new contract for elder employees is applicable.

compensatoryHealthInsuranceContributionI.description: Indicator whether or not a premium is paid for the health fund law. Necessary to calculate the social insurance premium.
